If the undertaking has not adopted targets meeting the criteria included in paragraphs 41 and 42 of DR8 , it shall disclose additional (a) if and when such targets will be adopted; or (b) reasons why there is no plan to adopt such targets; (c) how progress is measured without specific c limate-related targets and; (d) the progress made in terms of climate change mitigation and adaptation.
